reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but sometimes hard to follow. Great at answering questions during office hours.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Amazing lecturer! Makes difficult concepts easy to understand. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Challenging course, but the professor is fair. Lectures can be dry, but the labs are engaging.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Lectures were unorganized, and the material was often confusing. Not very approachable outside of class.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Good teacher with a lot of experience. Homework is tough but useful for learning the material.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Passionate about physics and great at explaining complex topics. Exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Literature and Composition
reviews.review: Engaging discussions, but grading can be harsh. Be prepared to write a lot.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Clear and concise lectures. Provides real-world examples that help solidify the concepts.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Not very enthusiastic about the subject. Lectures are dry, and exams are tricky.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Very passionate and knowledgeable. Encourages class participation and critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Spanish II
reviews.review: Engaging and helpful. Makes learning a new language fun and interactive.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Ethics
reviews.review: Interesting material, but lectures can be monotonous. Requires a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the environment. Very approachable and helpful outside of class.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Clear and organized lectures. Homework can be tough, but it's good practice for the exams.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Lectures are boring, and the exams are difficult. Not much interaction with students.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Excellent teacher. Explains everything clearly and provides plenty of practice problems.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Challenging course, but the professor is very knowledgeable. Labs are very hands-on.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but the professor is not very engaging. Assignments are fair.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Inspirational and encouraging. Provides great feedback on writing assignments.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: The material is challenging, and the professor is a tough grader. Be prepared to work hard.
